text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh―! I worked so hard today, too! 
These legs are beat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, oya? There's someone over there――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Rice! Where are you headed at this 
hour?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
M-Ms. Bakushin O! Um, I just thought, I
would run… for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice also wanted to do her best…. like 
everyone else, and, um……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I, I'm so sorry! I'll hurry back… right
now… before the curfew!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohhhh～～～! What a hard worker! 
Not to mention, that run……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Excellent… One of my rivals, indeed! My
battered legs are itching to get going!
choice_data_list: You're going to run some more?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Excellent… One of my rivals, indeed! My
battered legs are itching to get going!
choice_data_list: You're going to run some more?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What a fantastic idea! 
By all means, let's do it!

After that, Rice Shower and Sakura
Bakushin O did additional training
together until curfew.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course I will! I'll Bakushin with all
my might tomorrow―!

Sakura Bakushin O was already full of 
energy for tomorrow's training.
